company.name: General Container
company.tagline: The most complete selection of shipping and storage containers available
company.description: General Container offers the most complete selection of shipping and storage containers available, including Stainless Steel Drums, Steel Drums, Polyethylene Drums, Overpack/Salvage Drums, CurTec Packaging, Pails and Cans, Fiber Drums, and more.

hero.headline: The Most Complete Selection of Shipping and Storage Containers
hero.subheadline: Including Stainless Steel Drums, Steel Drums, Polyethylene Drums, Overpack/Salvage Drums, CurTec Packaging, Pails and Cans, Fiber Drums, and more.

about.headline: About Us
about.content: General Container offers the most complete selection of shipping and storage containers available. We specialize in providing high-quality industrial containers including stainless steel drums, steel drums, polyethylene drums, overpack/salvage drums, CurTec packaging, pails and cans, fiber drums, intermediate bulk containers, and composite drums.
